verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and say <WH559> to them, Concerning the feasts <WH4150> of the LORD, <WH3068> which <WH834> you shall proclaim <WH7121> to be holy <WH6944> convocations, <WH4744> even these <WH428> are my feasts. <WH4150>

Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> shall work <WH4399> be done: <WH6213> but the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> is the sabbath <WH7676> of rest, <WH7677> an holy <WH6944> convocation; <WH4744> you shall do <WH6213> no <WH3808> work <WH4399> therein: it is the sabbath <WH7676> of the LORD <WH3068> in all <WH3605> your dwellings. <WH4186>
These <WH428> are the feasts <WH4150> of the LORD, <WH3068> even holy <WH6944> convocations, <WH4744> which <WH834> you shall proclaim <WH7121> in their seasons. <WH4150>
In the fourteenth <WH702> <WH6240> day of the first <WH7223> month <WH2320> at <WH996> even <WH6153> is the LORD's <WH3068> passover. <WH6453>

And on the fifteenth <WH2568> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the same <WH2088> month <WH2320> is the feast <WH2282> of unleavened <WH4682> bread to the LORD: <WH3068> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> you must eat <WH398> unleavened <WH4682> bread.
In the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> you shall have <WH1961> an holy <WH6944> convocation: <WH4744> you shall do <WH6213> no <WH3605> <WH3808> servile <WH5656> work <WH4399> therein.

But you shall offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire to the LORD <WH3068> seven <WH7651> days: <WH3117> in the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> is an holy <WH6944> convocation: <WH4744> you shall do <WH6213> no <WH3605> <WH3808> servile <WH5656> work <WH4399> therein.
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and say <WH559> to them, When <WH3588> you be come <WH935> into <WH413> the land <WH776> which <WH834> I give <WH5414> to you, and shall reap <WH7114> the harvest <WH7105> thereof, then you shall bring <WH935> a sheaf <WH6016> of the first fruits <WH7225> of your harvest <WH7105> to the priest: <WH3548>

And he shall wave <WH5130> the sheaf <WH6016> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> to be accepted <WH7522> for you: on the morrow <WH4283> after the sabbath <WH7676> the priest <WH3548> shall wave <WH5130> it.

And you shall offer <WH6213> that day <WH3117> when you wave <WH5130> the sheaf <WH6016> an he lamb <WH3532> without <WH8549> blemish <WH8549> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> for a burnt <WH5930> offering to the LORD. <WH3068>

And the meat offering <WH4503> thereof shall be two <WH8147> tenth <WH6241> deals of fine flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> an offering made by fire to the LORD <WH3068> for a sweet <WH5207> smell: <WH7381> and the drink <WH5262> offering thereof shall be of wine, <WH3196> the fourth <WH7243> part of an hin. <WH1969>

And you shall eat <WH398> neither <WH3808> bread, <WH3899> nor parched <WH7039> corn, nor green ears, <WH3759> until <WH5704> the selfsame <WH2088> <WH6106> day <WH3117> that you have brought <WH935> an offering <WH7133> to your God: <WH430> it shall be a statute <WH2708> for ever <WH5769> throughout your generations <WH1755> in all <WH3605> your dwellings. <WH4186>

And you shall count <WH5608> to you from the morrow <WH4283> after the sabbath, <WH7676> from the day <WH3117> that you brought <WH935> the sheaf <WH6016> of the wave <WH8573> offering; seven <WH7651> sabbaths <WH7676> shall be complete: <WH8549>

Even to the morrow <WH4283> after the seventh <WH7637> sabbath <WH7676> shall you number <WH5608> fifty <WH2572> days; <WH3117> and you shall offer <WH7126> a new <WH2319> meat offering <WH4503> to the LORD. <WH3068>

You shall bring <WH935> out of your habitations <WH4186> two <WH8147> wave <WH8573> loaves <WH3899> of two <WH8147> tenth <WH6241> deals; they shall be of fine flour; <WH5560> they shall be baked <WH644> with leaven; <WH2557> they are the first fruits <WH1061> to the LORD. <WH3068>

And you shall offer <WH7126> with the bread <WH3899> seven <WH7651> lambs <WH3532> without <WH8549> blemish <WH8549> of the first <WH1121> year, <WH8141> and one <WH259> young <WH1121> <WH1241> bullock, <WH6499> and two <WH8147> rams: <WH352> they shall be for a burnt <WH5930> offering to the LORD, <WH3068> with their meat offering, <WH4503> and their drink <WH5262> offerings, even an offering made by fire, of sweet <WH5207> smell <WH7381> to the LORD. <WH3068>

Then you shall sacrifice <WH6213> one <WH259> kid <WH8163> of the goats <WH5795> for a sin <WH2403> offering, and two <WH8147> lambs <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> for a sacrifice <WH2077> of peace <WH8002> offerings.

And the priest <WH3548> shall wave <WH5130> them with the bread <WH3899> of the first fruits <WH1061> for a wave <WH8573> offering before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> with the two <WH8147> lambs: <WH3532> they shall be holy <WH6944> to the LORD <WH3068> for the priest. <WH3548>

And you shall proclaim <WH7121> on the selfsame <WH2088> <WH6106> day, <WH3117> that it may be an holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744> to you: you shall do <WH6213> no <WH3605> <WH3808> servile <WH5656> work <WH4399> therein: it shall be a statute <WH2708> for ever <WH5769> in all <WH3605> your dwellings <WH4186> throughout your generations. <WH1755>

And when you reap <WH7114> the harvest <WH7105> of your land, <WH776> you shall not make clean <WH2891> riddance <WH3615> of the corners <WH6285> of your field <WH7704> when you reap, <WH7114> neither <WH3808> shall you gather <WH3950> any gleaning <WH3951> of your harvest: <WH7105> you shall leave <WH5800> them to the poor, <WH6041> and to the stranger: <WH1616> I am the LORD <WH3068> your God. <WH430>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> In the seventh <WH7637> month, <WH2320> in the first <WH259> day <WH3117> of the month, <WH2320> shall you have <WH1961> a sabbath, <WH7677> a memorial <WH2146> of blowing <WH8643> of trumpets, an holy <WH6944> convocation. <WH4744>
You shall do <WH6213> no <WH3605> <WH3808> servile <WH5656> work <WH4399> therein: but you shall offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire to the LORD. <WH3068>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Also <WH389> on the tenth <WH6218> day of this <WH2088> seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320> there shall be a day <WH3117> of atonement: <WH3725> it shall be an holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744> to you; and you shall afflict <WH6031> your souls, <WH5315> and offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire to the LORD. <WH3068>

And you shall do <WH6213> no <WH3808> work <WH4399> in that same <WH6106> day: <WH3117> for it is a day <WH3117> of atonement, <WH3725> to make an atonement <WH3722> for you before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> your God. <WH430>
For whatever <WH3605> soul <WH5315> it be that shall not be afflicted <WH6031> in that same <WH6106> day, <WH3117> he shall be cut <WH3772> off from among his people. <WH5971>

And whatever <WH3605> soul <WH5315> it be that does <WH6213> any <WH3605> work <WH4399> in that same <WH6106> day, <WH3117> the same <WH6106> soul <WH5315> will I destroy <WH6> from among <WH7130> his people. <WH5971>
You shall do <WH6213> no <WH3808> manner of work: <WH4399> it shall be a statute <WH2708> for ever <WH5769> throughout your generations <WH1755> in all <WH3605> your dwellings. <WH4186>

It shall be to you a sabbath <WH7676> of rest, <WH7677> and you shall afflict <WH6031> your souls: <WH5315> in the ninth <WH8672> day of the month <WH2320> at even, <WH6153> from even <WH6153> to even, <WH6153> shall you celebrate <WH7673> your sabbath. <WH7676>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> The fifteenth <WH2568> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of this <WH2088> seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320> shall be the feast <WH2282> of tabernacles <WH5521> for seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> to the LORD. <WH3068>
On the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> shall be an holy <WH6944> convocation: <WH4744> you shall do <WH6213> no <WH3605> <WH3808> servile <WH5656> work <WH4399> therein.

Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> you shall offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire to the LORD: <WH3068> on the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> shall be an holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744> to you; and you shall offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire to the LORD: <WH3068> it is a solemn <WH6116> assembly; <WH6116> and you shall do <WH6213> no <WH3605> <WH3808> servile <WH5656> work <WH4399> therein.

These <WH428> are the feasts <WH4150> of the LORD, <WH3068> which <WH834> you shall proclaim <WH7121> to be holy <WH6944> convocations, <WH4744> to offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire to the LORD, <WH3068> a burnt <WH5930> offering, <WH4503> and a meat offering, a sacrifice, <WH2077> and drink <WH5262> offerings, every thing <WH1697> on his day: <WH3117>

Beside <WH905> the sabbaths <WH7676> of the LORD, <WH3068> and beside <WH905> your gifts, <WH4979> and beside <WH905> all <WH3605> your vows, <WH5088> and beside <WH905> all <WH3605> your freewill <WH5071> offerings, which <WH834> you give <WH5414> to the LORD. <WH3068>

Also <WH389> in the fifteenth <WH2568> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the seventh <WH7637> month, <WH2320> when you have gathered <WH622> in the fruit <WH8393> of the land, <WH776> you shall keep <WH2287> a feast <WH2282> to the LORD <WH3068> seven <WH7651> days: <WH3117> on the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> shall be a sabbath, <WH7677> and on the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> shall be a sabbath. <WH7677>

And you shall take <WH3947> you on the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> the boughs <WH6529> of goodly <WH1926> trees, <WH6086> branches <WH3709> of palm <WH8558> trees, and the boughs <WH6057> of thick <WH5687> trees, <WH6086> and willows <WH6155> of the brook; <WH5158> and you shall rejoice <WH8055> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> seven <WH7651> days. <WH3117>

And you shall keep <WH2287> it a feast <WH2282> to the LORD <WH3068> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> in the year. <WH8141> It shall be a statute <WH2708> for ever <WH5769> in your generations: <WH1755> you shall celebrate <WH2287> it in the seventh <WH7637> month. <WH2320>
You shall dwell <WH3427> in booths <WH5521> seven <WH7651> days; <WH3117> all <WH3605> that are Israelites <WH3478> born <WH249> shall dwell <WH3427> in booths: <WH5521>

That your generations <WH1755> may know <WH3045> that I made the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> to dwell <WH3427> in booths, <WH5521> when I brought <WH3318> them out of the land <WH776> of Egypt: <WH4714> I am the LORD <WH3068> your God. <WH430>
And Moses <WH4872> declared <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> the feasts <WH4150> of the LORD. <WH3068>
